name: Valzar
description: Explore an uncharted land and recover the pieces of a broken amulet. Valzar is a tough arena action platformer with roguelike elements.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP, Vista, 7 Processor: 2.0 GHz or faster Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Pixel Shader 2.0 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 400 MB available space Additional Notes: Microsoft Xbox 360 Controller
